analyzer_config.name: Multi-Annotator Label Conflict Analyzer
analyzer_config.description: Detects, analyzes, and resolves labeling inconsistencies in datasets

conflict_patterns.positive_vs_negative: Strong sentiment disagreement - text may contain mixed opinions
conflict_patterns.positive_vs_neutral: Mixed signal - text has positive elements but lacks strong positivity
conflict_patterns.negative_vs_neutral: Severity interpretation - text has negative aspects but not overwhelmingly
conflict_patterns.three_way_conflict: High ambiguity - text has multiple conflicting signals
